The claim has been repeated by other pol: including Sens. Bob Casey and Kirsten Gillibrand, as well as Vice President Joe Biden.
Donald Trump did use the phrase: wages too high" during a GOP debate on November 10, 2015, but it was in reference to his opposition to raising the federal minimum wage to $15, not a statement about overall wages being too high.
Trump clarified his statement in a subse: stating that he was specifically referring to the minimum wage and not wages in general.
